!Trader Raudia: Oh my goodness -- are you by any chance a Knight? I think that Knights are the best of the best, don't you? As long as the Knights from the castle protect us, I know that we're safe even from an Elmorean attack or a crazy Wizard from the Ivory Tower. You Knights are without peer! Don't you agree? Oh, you are such a modest customer...
